article.para: DocBook has been under active development for more than a decade. Earlier releases of DocBook are provided here for reference, they were never work products of the DocBook Technical Committee (see A Short DocBook History) and are not officially supported.

section.title: DocBook NG
section.para: There were a whole series of “NG” releases before DocBook V5.0 became official.
There were a few test releases of other modules as well.

section.title: DocBook Slides
section.para: A version of Slides based on NG.

section.title: DocBook Websites
section.para: A version of Website based on NG.
